metadata.synopsis: Combat AD. Player has just killed a spawn that Cazador needed to complete his ritual. Now he'll never be able to ascend to power.

0.speaker: Cazador Szarr
0.text: What have you done?! I need them alive, you maggot!
0.context: InternalNodeContext: 'you' referring to player, 'them' referring to his vampire spawn "children"
